children.name: about
children.sourceText: Why do ye go about perverting the ways of the Lord?

children.name: all
children.sourceText: Why do ye speak against all the prophecies of the holy prophets?

children.name: of
children.sourceText: Why do ye go about perverting the ways of the Lord?

children.name: shall
children.sourceText: Why do ye teach this people that there shall be no Christ, to interrupt their rejoicings?

children.name: that
children.sourceText: Why do ye teach this people that there shall be no Christ, to interrupt their rejoicings?

children.name: the
children.sourceText: Why do ye go about perverting the ways of the Lord?

children.name: their
children.sourceText: Why do ye teach this people that there shall be no Christ, to interrupt their rejoicings?

children.name: there
children.sourceText: Why do ye teach this people that there shall be no Christ, to interrupt their rejoicings?

children.name: this
children.sourceText: Why do ye teach this people that there shall be no Christ, to interrupt their rejoicings?

children.name: to
children.sourceText: Why do ye teach this people that there shall be no Christ, to interrupt their rejoicings?

children.name: ye
children.sourceText: Why do ye go about perverting the ways of the Lord?
